vendor_name: Crowne Plaza Jordan - Dead Sea Resort & Spa
title: Jordan Stylish Dead Sea Oasis with Private Beach
description: Incredibly placed along the Dead Sea, five-star luxury awaits at Crowne Plaza Jordan - Dead Sea Resort & Spa, an IHG Hotel. Just moments away, the sunkissed sands of the hotel's private beach and the soothing Dead Sea beckon. Laze at sunset at the dazzling outdoor pool or indulge in a restorative treatment at D’sante Spa. When you’re not soaking in the spectacular landscape, head to Burj Al Hamam for authentic Lebanese fare or El Grito for Mexican cuisine to fuel your days of sun.
location_description: Crowne Plaza Jordan - Dead Sea Resort & Spa, an IHG Hotel
